duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the technical liaison and resource for the Automation business, supporting customers and acting as the point of contact for PLC, software, and network.
Manage technical questions for assigned products, PLC, software, and networks, and communicate product issues to vendors and internal customers.
Understand Automation solutions and other product lines, highlighting network benefits and applications.
Basic knowledge and understanding of Panel Design, PLC’s, SCADA design/programming, and Intelligent Motor Control.
Implement marketing and promotional programs, as well as product launches.
